metadata.description:
"Depend On You" is an intimate and provocative R&B track by the multi-talented artist, Lexy Panterra. With her distinctive voice and impressive dance skills, Lexy has garnered a massive following on social media and has become a force to be reckoned with in the music industry.

The song is being released in two unique versions, Pt.1 and Pt.2. While Pt.1 is a slow and sultry track, Pt.2 is a high-energy electronic remix that will make you want to dance the night away. What's more, Pt.2 will be released exclusively as an NFT through the innovative platform Sound XYZ, making it a one-of-a-kind collectible item for fans of Lexy and electronic music.

In "Depend On You," Lexy sings about the intense connection she shares with her lover, but instead of relying on clich√©d metaphors and generic lyrics, she uses vivid imagery and poetic language to convey the raw passion and emotion of the relationship. The lyrics are both sensual and vulnerable, exploring the complexities of love and intimacy in a refreshingly honest way.

Overall, "Depend On You" is a bold and innovative track that showcases Lexy's talent as a singer, songwriter, and producer. With its two unique versions and exclusive NFT release, it's a must-listen for fans of R&B and electronic music alike.
metadata.name: Depend On You (Pt. 2) #1
metadata.title: Depend On You (Pt. 2)
